title: Room For Rent - Sept 1st
posting_body: ['One bedroom for a SEPTEMBER 1ST move in available in a beautiful 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment right in the heart of Prospect Heights.', 'We live a 10-minute walk from the B/Q/A/C/2/3.', 'The apartment is surrounded by tons of bars & restaurants.', "There is a laundromat right around the corner that's open late and is super convenient.", 'The apartment is also within walking distance to Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanical Garden, and the Brooklyn Museum.', "It’s an amazing price for the location and we've loved living in this apartment!", 'The room is 7.5’ by 11.5’ with a window, spacious closet and hardwood floors.', 'The room will be unfinished and will be $1000 a month and a security deposit of $1000 for move in.', 'Utilities (gas and electric) are usually between $65-$100 depending on the season.', 'Usually higher in the summer with AC usage.', 'The roommates: 30 year old (f) working in fashion and a 29 year old (f) pilates instructor.', 'We both work quite a bit so we like to have nice homey environment.', 'We are looking for a clean and courteous roommate.', 'We go out occasionally but never bring the party home so we appreciate someone who feels the same way.', 'Just overall looking for someone who will be respectful and a great addition to the apartment!', 'Must be good with dogs - We have a very sweet rescue pit/mix who is wary of strangers at first, but becomes a lap dog once she knows you.', 'We signed a new lease last year after the dog moved in that prohibits pets, but luckily they grandfathered her in and allowed for us to stay.', 'This unfortunately means no other pets are allowed.', 'Thanks!']
